definitions:
to examine; to investigate thoroughly; to inquire; to question
O detetive perscrutou o suspeito com grande aplicação. The detective investigated the suspect diligently.

to try to learn; to try to discover a secret
Vivia perscrutando os mistérios da devoção religiosa. He lived trying to learn about the mysteries of religious devotion.
description: perscrutar (first-person singular present indicative perscruto, past participle perscrutado)
